Index.infoText: I build accessible, inclusive products and digital experiences for the web.
Index.aboutDescription1: Hi, I’m a Full Stack Engineer with 5 years of experience in HTML, CSS, React, and Node.js. I enjoy using creativity and technology to make user-friendly websites. I’m good at solving tough problems and creating scalable apps.ed to contribute my skills and passion to your development team.
Index.aboutDescription2: I’m always eager to learn and keep up with industry trends. I work well in teams and believe in clear communication. I’m excit to contribute my skills and passion to your development team.
Index.subject: Subject
Index.footerText: Coded in Visual Studio Code. Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, deployed with Vercel
